name: Diving Gel
movement: slow on land, fast in water
description: A small, gelatinous creature capable of moving through narrow spaces with its amorphous form, the Diving Gel is adept at swimming and retains a solid shape in water but struggles on land.
memorable: Its ability to attach to creatures and provide breathable air while restricting movement makes it a unique threat in aquatic environments.
goals: To survive by ambushing prey in aquatic surroundings and utilizing its attachments for breath support.
relations: May associate with other aquatic creatures or oozes of similar nature.
environment: Primarily found in aquatic environments but can survive on land for short periods.
strengths: High Dexterity and resistance to acid, fire, and poison damage enhance its survivability.
weaknesses: Extremely low Strength and Intelligence limit its physical effectiveness and ability to reason.
attacks: Uses Pseudopod to bludgeon foes, and can Attach to restrict movement while providing air.
most_powerful_ability: The Attach ability allows the Diving Gel to gain an advantage on attacks and control the breathing of its prey.
senses: The Diving Gel has limited perception abilities with a passive Perception of 8.
skills: Possesses some perception ability despite low Wisdom, enabling it to detect nearby actions.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water due to its amphibious ability.
Does not require sleep, remaining alert at all times.
Highly agility allows effective maneuverability in tight spaces.
test_queries: amorphous monster that provides breathable air
dexterous ooze that lives in water
creature that can attach and restrict movement
